name: RemoveCustomerDevice
description:
Remove a device from a customer's profile.

This tool removes a specified device from a customer's profile in Customer.io. It should be called when you need to ensure a device is detached from a customer's profile to prevent re-adding it accidentally.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a person in the system. Can be `id`, `email`, or `cio_id` (prefixed with `cio_`).

value_schema.description: The unique value representing a person. The values you use to identify a person may be an `id`, `email` address, or the `cio_id` (when updating people), depending on your workspace settings. When you reference people by `cio_id`, you must prefix the value with `cio_`.

parameters.name: device_unique_id
parameters.description: The ID representing the device to be removed from the customer's profile.

value_schema.description: The ID of the device you want to perform an operation against.
